docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Rumsfeld, with a sheaf of papers under his arm, opens the staff door to the Oval Office and nods over his shoulder to me to follow him, and we walk in. The President, seated behind his desk, greets us; first names come easily to him, and because he and I have met before, he uses mine.
